name: perceptual-hash-wasm
description: WebAssembly perceptual hash calculation for emoji duplicate detection

scripts.build: emcc perceptual_hash.c -O3 -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='calculate_perceptual_hash,calculate_batch_hashes,calculate_hamming_distance,free_hash_result,free_batch_results' -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='cwrap' -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -o perceptual_hash.js
scripts.build-debug: emcc perceptual_hash.c -g -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='calculate_perceptual_hash,calculate_batch_hashes,calculate_hamming_distance,free_hash_result,free_batch_results' -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='cwrap' -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -o perceptual_hash.js
scripts.build-optimized: emcc perceptual_hash.c -O3 -flto -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='calculate_perceptual_hash,calculate_batch_hashes,calculate_hamming_distance,free_hash_result,free_batch_results' -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='cwrap' -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s WASM_ASYNC_COMPILATION=1 -o perceptual_hash.js
